comment: Wow ! Really disappointed with the latest update . Now, you can't even listen to songs on repeat? The only way to deal with this issue was to go back and play the song from start but now , you can't go back too? Basic features require premium :') nice . This app is everything a music app should not be .
key sentence: Key words: the latest update, listen to songs on repeat, basic features require premium
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
